mapper.select: select * from( select @NO := @NO + 1 as ROWNUM, A.* from ( select c.car_seq carSeq, c.rent_amt rentAmt, c.drive_amt driveAmt, c.car_num carNum, c.car_type carType, c.oil_type oilType, c.car_option carOption, c.socar_zone socarZone, c.car_img carImg from Car c order by car_seq desc )A, (select @NO := 0)B )C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN ${start} and ${end};
select count(*) as count from Car
select count(*) as count from Car where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select * from( select @NO := @NO + 1 as ROWNUM, A.* from ( select c.car_seq carSeq, c.rent_amt rentAmt, c.drive_amt driveAmt, c.car_num carNum, c.car_type carType, c.oil_type oilType, c.car_option carOption, c.socar_zone socarZone, c.car_img carImg from Car c where ${keyField} like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by car_seq desc )A, (select @NO := 0)B )C where C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{start} and #{end};
